I got this work by this:

1. Install with setup.exe

2. Go to cmd

3. write following: cd c:\DIR   (Example: cd 
c:\Program Files\Dirt 2

4. Write arc x 1 and it should start unpacking it.

5. There should be now audio file in your dirt 2 dir.

6. Write arc x 2

7. Write arc x 3

8. Write arc x 4

9. Now your should have many new folders in dirt 2 directory, including dirt.exe!

10. Done! Race for your life!

ok finally i got this working

All guys who are running windows 7 and getting 4 errors at the end of installation please follow this steps

1. Uninstall dirt 2 folder from c:\program files\dirt 2

2. right click on setup.exe click properties then click on compatibility tab check run this program in compatibility mode for windows xp service pack 3 and also check run this program as an administrator click apply ok

3. Now run the set up and it will ask your permission to run it click Yes, then the set up will run and after 20 minutes your game will be install with no errors

4. then click on the icon on your desktop to play it (dirt 2)

Enjoy

If your game crashes or hangs after first race please use this fix
